ygData.subject: Re: Words of Quivering
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok I will buy it from you how much do you want for it and where can I meet you? ...
ygData.messageBody:
Ok I will buy it from you how much do you want for it and where can I
meet you?



--- Rob Wiltbank <chade@...> wrote:
> Hey there, folks..
>
> Looking for some info.. I was fighting a creature
> and pulled off a scroll looking object called Words
> of Quivering -- all classes and races, no way to
> read or scribe it. The vendors would buy it for
> several plats, I think it may be a research
> component, any ideas?
>
> Chade
> Povar
>
<HR>

<BODY bgColor=#ffffff>
<DIV><FONT face=Arial size=2>Hey there, folks..</FONT></DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV><FONT face=Arial size=2>Looking for some info..  I was
fighting a
creature and pulled off a scroll looking object called Words of
Quivering -- all
classes and races, no way to read or scribe it.  The vendors
would buy
it for several plats, I think it may be a research component, any
ideas?</FONT></DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV><FONT face=Arial size=2>Chade</FONT></DIV>
<DIV><FONT face=Arial size=2>Povar</FONT></DIV></BODY></HTML>
